Description: Upgrades internet bandwidth of ECS instances.

instanceIds.Description: The ID list of the ECS instance.

maxBandwidthIn.Description: The maximum public network bandwidth for in-direction.

maxBandwidthOut.Description: The maximum public network bandwidth for out-direction.

startTime.Description: The start time of upgrade. Format: yyyy-MM-ddThh:mmZ.

endTime.Description: The end time of upgrade. Format: yyyy-MM-ddThhZ.

maxErrors.Description: The maximum number of errors allowed during task execution.

OOSAssumeRole.Description: The RAM role to be assumed by OOS.

Tasks.Name: modifyInstanceNetworkSpec
Tasks.Description: Modifies the temporary bandwidth of the instance with the specified parameters.
